IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR PROGRAMS AND SERVICES OF THE UNITED METHODIST CHILDREN'S HOME, INC. AND THE UNITED METHODIST BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR PROGRAMS AND SERVICES OF THE UNITED METHODIST CHILDREN'S HOME, INC. AND THE UNITED METHODIST BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC.
IRS990.Desc: THESE PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENDITURES REPRESENT SCHOLARSHIP ASSISTANCE AND OTHER PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN AND FAMILIES OF ARKANSAS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR PROGRAMS FOSTERED BY UNITED METHODIST CHILDRENS HOME WHICH PROVIDES BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES AND PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN AND FAMILIES OF ARKANSAS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR PROGRAMS FOSTERED BY UNITED METHODIST BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SYSTEM WHICH SUPPORTS DEVELOPMENT AND OPERATION OF PROGRAMS OF CHILD CARE TO INCLUDE ACUTE CARE, RESIDENTIAL CARE, OUTPATIENT CLINICAL SERVICES AND OTHER SERVICES AND PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES TOPIC OF THE ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION (ASC), THE FOUNDATION WOULD RECOGNIZE, IF ANY, ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS AN INCOME TAX PROVISION. THE PAST THREE YEARS OF TAX RETURNS, ALONG WITH THE CURRENT YEAR RETURN, ARE SUBJECT TO POTENTIAL EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSE INCLUDED ON PART VIII 52,609.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSE INCLUDED ON PART VIII 52,609.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION PAYS A MANAGEMENT FEE TO A RELATED COMPANY TO PERFORM MANAGEMENT DUTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FEDERAL FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CFO BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE AN ANNUAL QUESTIONNAIRE THAT ASKS BOARD MEMBERS TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HUMAN RESOURCE DEPARTMENT COMPARES EACH SALARY TO INDUSTRY AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES EACH SALARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
